show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #70 Fred Provenza "The Flavor of the Land"
subtitle: #70 Fred Provenza "The Flavor of the Land"
summary:
Author and speaker Dr. Fred Provenza joined me on Zoom to talk about his book and the original question that inspired him to write it, and how his search for an answer is going.

Nourishment, the book
